Body.Content:
Introduction

Cloud IntelliFrame, an AI-powered video enhancement feature for Microsoft Teams Rooms, is now available on Teams Rooms for Android with a Teams Rooms Pro license. This feature transforms the traditional wide-angle room view into a dynamic gallery of individual video tiles, improving visibility and engagement in hybrid meetings.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 499614.

When this will happen:

  • General Availability (Worldwide): Begins in mid-October 2025 and is expected to complete by late October 2025.

How this affects your organization:

Who is affected:

This change affects administrators who manage Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android devices that are licensed with Teams Rooms Pro.

What will happen:

  • Cloud IntelliFrame will become available for Teams Rooms on Android.
  • Administrators will be able to manage the feature through the Teams admin console. 
  • The feature will not be enabled by default; administrators must turn it on manually.
  • Existing admin policies will remain unchanged and are respected by this feature.

What you can do to prepare:

  • Enable Cloud IntelliFrame in small to medium-sized meeting rooms where hybrid collaboration is common.
  • Review the Teams admin console settings to ensure you can manage the feature as needed.
  • Communicate the featureâ€™s availability to your helpdesk or AV support teams to prepare for potential questions.
  • Update your internal documentation if it includes details about Microsoft Teams Rooms features.

Learn more: Cloud IntelliFrame | Microsoft Teams | Microsoft Learn

Compliance considerations:

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Cloud IntelliFrame, an AI video enhancement feature, is now available on Teams Rooms for Android with a Teams Rooms Pro license starting mid-October 2025. Administrators must enable it manually via the Teams admin console, with no default activation or changes to existing policies.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame now available on Teams Rooms for Android
